channel.title: Bank(Pi)
channel.description:
Is there any possible way i can get a newer Bank? Bank tabs to be straight forward.. mine looks like this atm.
<script src='http://imageshack.us/shareable/?i=bankqh.png&s=849' type='text/javascript'></script><noscript>[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/849/bankqh.png/][IMG]http://img849.imageshack.us/img849/6396/bankqh.png[/img][/URL]</noscript>
as i want it simlar to this or should say like this
<script src='http://imageshack.us/shareable/?i=newbanko.png&s=6' type='text/javascript'></script><noscript>[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/6/newbanko.png/][IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/7149/newbanko.png[/img][/URL]</noscript>
any possible way?
